extension.description:
Masters Articles Contact Form

Developed by Christopher Masters

If you use Masters Articles Contact Form, please post a rating
and a review at the Joomla Extensions Directory.
Please remember to enable the plugin!

Masters Articles Contact Form displays a contact form from the Joomla! contact component in articles or content modules. Use either of the following to display the form...

  • Syntax: {masterscontactform:1} - The number immediately following ":" is the contact id from the Joomla! Contact Component.
  • Syntax: {masterscontactform:1|122} - The number immediately following the "|" is the menu item id.
